member.remarks: Ranges usually from -100 to 100. Negative values indicate blue and positive values indicate yellow.

member.name: T:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter
member.summary: Converts between color spaces and makes sure that the color is adapted using chromatic adaptation.

member.summary: Performs chromatic adaptation of given XYZ color. Target white point is .

member.summary: Adapts linear RGB color from the source working space to working space set in .

member.summary: Adapts RGB color from the source working space to working space set in .

member.summary: Adapts Lab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.summary: Adapts LChab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.summary: Adapts Lab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.summary: Adapts Luv color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.ChromaticAdaptation
member.summary: Chromatic adaptation method used. When null, no adaptation will be performed.

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.LMSTransformationMatrix
member.summary: Transformation matrix used in conversion to , also used in the default Von Kries Chromatic Adaptation method.

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.WhitePoint
member.summary: White point used for chromatic adaptation in conversions from/to XYZ color space. When null, no adaptation will be performed.

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.TargetLabWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* Lab/LChab colors. (Lab/LChab colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.TargetLuvWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* Luv/LChuv colors. (Luv/LChuv colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.TargetHunterLabWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* HunterLab colors. (HunterLab colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Colourful.Conversion.ColourfulConverter.TargetRGBWorkingSpace
member.summary: Working space used *when creating* RGB colors. (RGB colors on the input already contain the working space information) Defaults to: .

member.name: T:Colourful.Conversion.IChromaticAdaptation
member.summary: Chromatic adaptation. A linear transformation of a source color (XS, YS, ZS) into a destination color (XD, YD, ZD) by a linear transformation [M] which is dependent on the source reference white (XWS, YWS, ZWS) and the destination reference white (XWD, YWD, ZWD).

member.name: M:Colourful.Conversion.IChromaticAdaptation.Transform(Colourful.XYZColor,Colourful.XYZColor,Colourful.XYZColor)
member.remarks: Doesn't crop the resulting color space coordinates (e. g. allows negative values for XYZ coordinates).

member.summary: Basic implementation of the von Kries chromatic adaptation model
